jenes.stage.operator.common

Class RankScaling<T extends Chromosome>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jenes.stage.AbstractStage<T>
      • jenes.stage.operator.Operator<T>
        • jenes.stage.operator.Scaling<T>
          • jenes.stage.operator.common.RankScaling<T>

  • public class RankScaling<T extends Chromosome>
extends Scaling<T>
    This operator implements the rank scaling. Rank scaling re-assigns the rank as fitness value to indiduals. The operator is compatible with multi-objective optimization. In that case, rank is in turn computed for each each objective.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
